Turfgrass & Landscape Managment.1: Understand and describe the essential science of plants and soils for managing any turf or landscape area.
Turfgrass & Landscape Managment.2: Calculate, analyze, interpret and present quantitative data relative to managing turf and landscape areas.
Turfgrass & Landscape Managment.3: Solve complex problems by analyzing the key issues involved, acquiring and assessing necessary information, and synthesizing information on all areas of turfgrass and landscapes.
Turfgrass & Landscape Managment.4: Understand and control all inputs and costs to create agronomically, economically, and environmentally sound management systems in turf and landscapes.
